content: if you re looking for a quick christmas stocking pattern you ve come to the right place you can knit this up in a day it took me about five hours mix them up - make some solid or make some of my striped jumbo christmas stockings in a jiffy you can make one for everyone in the family knit in the round using us size 15 needles and super bulky yarn you really can knit up a last minute gift good luck and happy knitting
